**2023-06-21 / @aclements, @adonovan, @andybons, @bradfitz, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @rsc**

- **cmd/go: add package forwarding** [#60696](https://go.dev/issue/60696)

**Accepted**

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ðŸŽ‰

  - no change in consensus; **accepted** ðŸŽ‰

**Declined**

- **Go 2: add \`??\` operator to select first non-zero value** [#37165](https://go.dev/issue/37165)
  - obsoleted by #60204

  - obsoleted by #50860
- **Securing Go vendor packaging** [#20885](https://go.dev/issue/20885)
  - obsoleted by Go modules
- **log: change Logger to be an interface** [#13182](https://go.dev/issue/13182)
  - obsoleted by #56345
- **make rune be a new type of concrete type int32, not an alias** [#29012](https://go.dev/issue/29012)
  - declined as infeasible
